full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,DPAL YE SHES KYI MGON PO PHYAG DRUG PA'I BSNYEN SGRUB LAS GSUM GYI RNAM GZHAG DNGOS GRUB 'BYUNG GNAS ZHES BYA BA BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @015B (ZHES MGON PO BSNYEN CING SGRUB PA LAS GSUM GYI RNAM BZHAG DNGOS GRUB KYI 'BYUNG GNAS ZHES BYA BA 'DI NI MJO MO MKHAR NAS NANG SO GU SHRI CHEN PO BSOD NAMS RGYA MTSOS NAN GYIS BSKUL BA LA BRTEN NAS, RGYAL BA THAMS CAD MKHYEN PA BLA MA MGON PO DBYER MED 'PHAGS PA 'JIG RTEN DBANG PHYUG DANG THA MI DAD PA DON GYI SLAD DU MTSAN NAS SMOS TE MKHAN PO RIN PO CHE RDO RJE 'CHANG BSOD NAMS RGYA MTSO BSTAN PA'I RGYAL MTSAN DPAL BZANG PO SOGS YONGS 'DZIN DU MA'I ZHABS RDUL SPYI BOR LEN PA SH'AKYA'I DGE SLONG BSOD NAMS YE SHES DBANG PO'I DPAL GYIS SA SKYONG ZHES PA SHING MO BYA'I LO HOR ZLA BRGYAD PA'I YAR TSES BZANG PO LA SBYAR BA 'DIS KYANG RGYAL BA'I BSTAN PA RIN PO CHE DAR ZHING RGYAS LA YUN RING DU GNAS PA'I RGYUR GYUR CIG ,)
author_simple: BSOD NAMS YE SHES DBANG PO,
dates_of_the_author_(зохиогдсон_өдөр): SA SKYONG ZHES PA SHING MO BYA'I LO HOR ZLA BRGYAD PA'I YAR TSES BZANG PO,
